text: "It Must Have Been Love" is a song by Roxette. It was released in 1987 and again in 1990. This song reached #1 on the Billboard Hot 100 in June 1990. The song is about a breakup on a day in winter. The song was re-released in September 1993. Category:1987 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs Category:Pop ballads Category:Roxette songs Category:Shirley Bassey songs
title: It Must Have Been Love
